fragments.msn: I'm truly sorry, for real, but my parents cannot know about it.
So the guy of the note it was you, Guille.
So now you talk to me.
What about half of the class ignoring me?
What are you doing in the girls' toilet, Guille?
You can't be here, go away.
I need to talk to you, i'm the one who left the note.
Now do you talk to me?
What about half of the class ignores me?
That's what i want to talk to you.
I can't talk to you while Alex or any of his friends see us.
He's threatened me to send to my parents a picture of me smoking and drinking.
My parents are very strict and if they discover it i don't know what could happen...they might even send me to another high school.
But why Alex doesn't want anybody to talk me?
We don't know, he has it in for you since the first day.
Too many people does what he wants, but there're a few of us who have been threatened by him.
It happened something similar last year to Maria, although it was Ana's thing.
She doesn't have friends since then and when someone tries to talk to her...she ignores us.
She hasn't forgiven us yet.
Well...i just wanted to say sorry, but until Alex stops being upset i won't be able to talk to you.
I'm really sorry <$ varObject('global', 'UserNameNonStatic') $>.

options.msn: And that's it? Alex gets what he wants?
What about my picture on the board? Was it Alex?

fragments.msn: I'm deeply sorry, for real.
But i don't want him to make my life miserable too.
